data.title: Shraddha Nigam's Transformation After Marrying Another 'Dil Mil Gayye' Actor Is Commendable!
data.meta_description: One of the popular TV actress, Shraddha Nigam bagged a lot of fan-following for her daily soaps namely, Choodiyan and Krishna Arjun specifically. Sharddha is
data.text:
One of the popular TV actress, Shraddha Nigam bagged a lot of fan-following for her daily soaps, Choodiyan and Krishna Arjun. Sharddha is not only a fine actress, but she is an amazing anchor as she hosted a show named, The Best of Sa Re Ga Ma Pa Challenge 2007.

advertisement

Recommended Read: Dalljiet Kaur Shares One Final Anniversary Message For Her Ex-Husband Shaleen Bhanot

advertisement

advertisement

There is no denying that Shraddha has been in the limelight mostly for her first marriage with Karan Singh Grover. But guys, there is much more you need to know about her, which is totally worth it!

advertisement

So, before giving you a glimpse of her change or transformation so to say, let us tell you a few things that many might not know. After getting divorced from Indian television's chick magnet, Karan Singh Grover, this gorgeous lady fell in love with Mayank Anand, who also happens to be an actor.

advertisement

Yes, you are right! He is that same guy, who played the role of Karanâ€™s best friend in famous show, Dill Mill Gayye. Initially, Shraddha and Mayank were just good friends and business partners as well, but little did they know that their friendship will turn into love. And, they eventually ended up tying the knot in 2013.

Do Check Out: 6 Shortest Marriages That Bollywood And Telly World Has Ever Witnessed

advertisement.

The spark is still alive in this cutesy couple and we wish it stays like this forever. She has just not moved on in life personally, but professionally as well. While Shraddha and Mayank are still focusing on their business, the actress has now become a famous fashion designer.

advertisement

advertisement

She did her graduation in Fashion Designing from Symboises Institute. And some time back, she has got bob-haircut and replaced her wardrobe with some elegant out-of-the box clothes of her own label. And trust us, she is nailing it like a pro!

Here is how she used to look earlier:

ADVT.

advertisement

You can see the new look and the change right here:

advertisement

You May Like: The Khatti Meethi Love Story Of Juhi Parmar and Sachin Shroff

advertisement

advertisement

advertisement

This new look is suiting her so much, no?

To let you all know, this adorable duo have a fashion label and it is called, 'Mayanakananadshraddhanigam', and their speciality lies in the fact that they give contemporary and modern touch to Indian fabric and style. They have made their own niche in fashion world (specifically in Mumbai).

Recommended Read: Navina Bole Of 'Ishqbaaz' Fame Just Got Married And Looked Like A Dream In A Red Lehenga

Not all relationships work best, but it feels so good to see your favourites moving on in life and living happily. All Shraddha fans are happy to see her growing in both, her personal as well as professionals life. We wish Shraddha Nigam and Mayank Anand lots of happiness and a lifetime of togetherness!

Images Courtesy: Instagram & Twitter
